originalText.text: The experience with Dr. Pruzansky has been nothing less than excellent. From consultation to post-op visit, Dr. P and his staff have provided me with thorough information with outstanding professionalism. The outcome has exceeded my expectations. Highly recommend him.

text.text: The experience with Dr. Pruzansky has been nothing less than excellent. From consultation to post-op visit, Dr. P and his staff have provided me with thorough information with outstanding professionalism. The outcome has exceeded my expectations. Highly recommend him.

originalText.text:
If I could give a higher rating, I would.

I met Dr. Jason Pruzansky when I had an emergency. I fell and   broke my elbow and urgent care referred me to him.

He knew that immediate surgery was necessary to repair the breaks,

Despite that,
He took the time to be sure that I was prepared and understood what he needed to do.

Dr. Pruzansky was patient, kind and understanding of my fears.
My recovery is 100%.

As a result, when I was diagnosed with basal thumb arthritis, I went back to him.

Dr. Pruzansky presented alterative treatments, which I tried, before I concluded that surgery was the most viable option for me.

Due to his skill as a surgeon, I have regained function beyond my expectations.

It is my pleasure to recommend Dr. Jason Pruzansky;
I wouldn’t go to anyone else!

originalText.text: Very impressed with Jason Pruzansky and team, my wrist excision surgery went very smoothly. I was nervous about the procedure having never had one before. I had a regional block in my arm and IV of propofol. Within 2 minutes of the IV I was feeling great and laughing and sent off for a very pleasant nap. Woke up 1hr 30 later in the recovery area with no memory of anything post falling asleep, no pain. 10/10 would surgery again with Jason

I had a regional block in my arm and IV of propofol. Within 2 minutes of the IV I was feeling great and laughing and sent off for a very pleasant nap. Woke up 1hr 30 later in the recovery area with no memory of anything post falling asleep, no pain. 10/10 would surgery again with Jason

originalText.text: Dr. Jason Pruzansky's expertise, talent and magic hands rescued my left hand after a very complicated injury with multiple fractures. My injury required two surgeries (both performed by Dr. Pruzansky) and a lot of physical therapy. I highly recommend Dr. Jason Pruzansky to other patients if they need high quality care. He is an amazing doctor.

text.text: Dr. Jason Pruzansky's expertise, talent and magic hands rescued my left hand after a very complicated injury with multiple fractures. My injury required two surgeries (both performed by Dr. Pruzansky) and a lot of physical therapy. I highly recommend Dr. Jason Pruzansky to other patients if they need high quality care. He is an amazing doctor.

originalText.text: Dr. Jason S. Pruzansky is an exceptional surgeon. I went to him with severely fractured 4th & 5th metacarpals (boxers fracture) and made a full recovery. If I didn’t tell you I broke my hand, you wouldn’t have been able to guess I did. His office is clean and organized, the staff are kind and appointments are very punctual. He is attentive, caring and hilarious. For those looking for a hand surgeon/doctor, this is the doctor you’ve been looking for.
